oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Rolling Down the Great Divide
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: motion pictures; Woodcuts (prints);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color one sheet (blue on white) announcing Rolling Down the Great Divide starring Bill (Cowboy Rambler) Boyd, Art Davis, and Lee Powell. Poster features woodcuts of scenes from the movie. Poster was designed and printed by the Southern Poster Printing Company in Atlanta, Georgia.
